    • Method Detail

      • mediaProjection

        public ScreencastStreamConfig.Builder mediaProjection(@NonNull
                                                      MediaProjection mediaProjection)
        Sets mediaProjection to capture screen contents for screencast live stream.
        Parameters:
        mediaProjection - A token granting applications the ability to capture screen contents.

      • videoResolution

        public ScreencastStreamConfig.Builder videoResolution(int width,
                                                      int height)
        Sets video resolution for live stream, this means the resolution that audience can see. If you didn't call this method, the default output video size will be 240p.
        Parameters:
        width - video width
        height - video height

      • densityDpi

        public ScreencastStreamConfig.Builder densityDpi(int densityDpi)
        Sets the density of the virtual display in dpi for screencast. If you didn't call this method, the default density will be DisplayMetrics.DENSITY_MEDIUM.
        Parameters:
        densityDpi - the density of the virtual display in dpi, must be greater than 0.

      • build

        public ScreencastStreamConfig build()
